QuestData.Title: Coalpart's Revenge
QuestData.Description: I'm so full I can't swing an axe even if I had one.$b$bTell ya what, we got a mutual interest here. I need yer help to get a little vengeance on the big botani at the back of this bloom. In return, I'll point ya in the right direction fer gettin' a secret weapon the botani keep.
QuestData.CompletionText: Me mother always said: "Burrian! Eat yer veggies!"$b$bGoing to make her proud today.
QuestData.RewardText: Me mother always told me to eat me vegetables. I dunna think this is what she had in mind.
